alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Florence; Marion; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:14PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Florence, northern Horry and south central Marion Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brittons Neck, or 13 miles west of Conway, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Conway, Horry, Loris, Hickory Grove, Homewood, Adrian, Pee Dee Crossroads, Brittons Neck, Goretown, Bayboro, Allsbrook, Green Sea, Aynor and Loris Community Hospital. This includes SC Highway 22 between mile markers 1 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Florence; Marion; Northern Horry
